pages.text: Compared to the [#](bb00bb)Bow[#](), the [#](bb00bb)Crossbow[#]() maintains a rather inconspicuous existence.\\With the Sniping Enchantment however, it turns the crossbow into a deadly ranged weapon.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Increases damage, accuracy and projectile speed.\\Max Level: 2\Applicable to Crossbows.\Mutually exclusive with Multishot.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a [#](bb00bb)common Book[#]() with Sniping by surrounding your [Enchanter](entry://enchanting/enchanter) with [Pigment](entry://general/pigment) and the other required materials.
